derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: extended form of haste, on the pattern of verbs in -en

entry.tran: 加速，加快（常指不愉快的事）
entry.def: If you hasten an event or process, often an unpleasant one, you make it happen faster or sooner.

example.ex: But if he does this, he may hasten the collapse of his own country.
example.tran: 但是如果他这样做，就有可能加速自己国家的崩溃。

entry.def: If you hasten to do something, you are quick to do it.

example.ex: She more than anyone had hastened to sign the contract.
example.tran: 她比谁都急着去签了合同。

entry.tran: （为避免他人误会）急忙（补充说）
entry.def: If you hasten to say something, you quickly add something to what you have just said in order to prevent it being misunderstood.

example.ex: Naturally, it'll go back. But without Murray's little note, I hasten to add...
example.tran: 很自然，它会返回。但没有默里的便条，我急忙补充道。

example.ex: 'There's no threat in this, Freddie,' Arnold hastened to say...
example.tran: “这不会有什么危险的，弗雷迪，”阿诺德急忙补充了一句。

entry.def: If you hasten somewhere, you hurry there.

example.ex: One of them, the first to alight, hastened with quicksilver steps towards me.
example.tran: 他们中第一个下来的人急急忙忙地快步向我走来。

means.word_mean: 1. act or move at high speed;

sentences.sentence: "He rushed down the hall to receive his guests"

means.word_mean: 3. speed up the progress of; facilitate;

sentences.sentence: "the infection precipitated a high fever and allergic reactions"

auth_sentence.content: There is nothing like competition to hasten progress.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is nothing like competition to hasten progress.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is nothing like competition to hasten progress.

auth_sentence.content: Co-educational schools probably tend to hasten heterosexual experimentation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Co-educational schools probably tend to hasten heterosexual experimentation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Co-educational schools probably tend to hasten heterosexual experimentation.

auth_sentence.content: Hasten thou And bring a sturdy javelin from the tent.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hasten thou And bring a sturdy javelin from the tent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hasten thou And bring a sturdy javelin from the tent.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"变成"; 2. 表形容词,"由……制成的",通常加在名词后面; 3. 表名词,"人或物"

stems_affixes.word_buile: strait海峡,困难+en变成→adj.艰难的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: gold金+en由……制成的→adj.金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
oak橡树+en由……制成的→adj.橡木制的
wax蜡+en由……制成的→adj.蜡的,蜡制的
wood木头+en由……制成的→adj.木制的;呆笨的
wool羊毛+en由……制成的→adj. 羊毛[制]的;毛纺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
chick小鸡+en人或物→n.鸡肉;鸡,小鸡,小鸟
city城市+en人或物→citizen
heath荒野,树丛+en人或物→n.异教徒
kit=cat猫+en人或物→kitten
maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
vix雌狐+en人或物→n.雌狐,泼妇
ward守卫,看守+en人或物→n.看守人,管理员
bright明亮的+en变成→v.[使]变亮,[使]愉快
broad宽+en变成→v.放宽,变阔
damp潮湿+en变成→v.[使]潮湿,使沮丧,泼凉水
dark黑+en变成→v.[使]变黑[变暗]
fright惊骇,吃惊+en变成→v.使惊吓;惊恐
hast匆忙+en变成→v.催促 v.赶紧
length长,长度+en变成→v.延长,[使]变长
sharp尖+en变成→v.削尖,使敏锐
short短+en变成→v.弄短,缩小,减少
sweet甜+en变成→v.使变甜 v.变甜
threat恐吓,凶兆,威胁I+en变成→v.恐吓,威胁
tight紧的+en变成→v.变紧,绷紧,拉紧
wake叫醒+en变成→v.醒来 v.唤醒
weak弱的+en变成→v.削弱,[使]变弱

sentences.en: I hasten to add that I knew nothing of the fraud at the time.
sentences.cn: 我忙不迭地补充说，我当时对那个骗局一无所知。

sentences.en: He hastened to assure us that the press would not be informed.
sentences.cn: 他急忙向我们保证新闻界是不会知道的。

sentences.en: Her row with the MD probably hastened her departure.
sentences.cn: 她与总裁的争吵很可能加速了她的离去。

sentences.en: The manager hastened to point out that his products were far superior to others.
sentences.cn: 经理急忙指出他的产品比其他的要好得多。

sentences.en: It was now obvious that he was hastening to restore the keys to their owner.
sentences.cn: 现在他显然正急着把钥匙归还原主。
